targets.query: SELECT last(value) FROM "memory/limit" WHERE "container_name" =~ /$container/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

list.name: namespace
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "uptime" WITH KEY = "pod_namespace"

list.name: pod
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "uptime" WITH KEY = "pod_name" WHERE pod_namespace =~ /$namespace/

list.name: container
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "uptime" WITH KEY = "container_name" WHERE pod_name =~ /$pod/ and "pod_namespace" =~ /$namespace/
